item.title: n=1 year in data: Ben Jiang
item.description:
Interviewed 16 October 2018. Lightly edited.
If you’re interested in being profiled, drop me a line! I’m interested in speaking to early-mid career data scientists (hence, n=1 year). What do you do? I’m a data scientist at KeyMe. Our key value prop is in the tech, e.g. deep learning, which we use to scan keys and model what the output should be. What did you study in school?
